accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Restrictions may apply concerning the use, photoduplication, or publication of items in this collection. Consult a member of the archives staff for information concerning these restrictions. The user assumes all responsibility for identifying and satisfying any claimants of copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Ellinger and Brothers records, Collection # 1463 WFCHS, Stewart Bell Jr. Archives, Handley Regional Library, Winchester, VA, USA.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: William Ellinger and Brother were dealers of groceries, whiskey, wines, cedar, and Queenware in Winchester, VA. The business was located on Water Street opposite Market Square (now Boscawen Street opposite City Hall).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains account books, ledgers, and an invoice book of this Winchester, VA business. Included are correspondences from Ellinger and Brother from December 1874 to August 1877.
Dealers in Groceries, Whiskeys, Wines, Cedar & Queenware, Water Street opposite Market Square (now Boscawen Street, oppostite City Hall)
February 1875-August 1877 - accounts payable, liabilities, assets, accounts receivable, debits,
copies of correspondence from Ellinger & Brother, November 1875-December 1876,
